Add real world text messaging animations to your videos! Create text or chat conversations with not only text but photos and videos too! All options are just a click of a button. The expression controlled animations automatically animate on screen plus we give you fine-tuning slider controls for each box animation.
NO KEYFRAMES â€“ itâ€™s super easy!

In the Control Panel each individual box can be flipped from the left side or right side with box and text colors automatically adjusted.

Create one word or one paragraph messages by adjusting the width and height of each box.
Features:
5 Animated Conversation Scenes with 10 boxes
50 Placeholders for Photos or Videos
5 Placeholders for Background Videos
No Third Party Plugins
HD1080
Adobe After Effects CS4 and all newer versions
